name: Pustolovko
description:
Pustolovko is a free platformer-like game in which you help little alien named Pustolovko explore the world, while avoiding enemies. Your goal in this game is to collect all the missing keys to enable yourself to finish the exploration. On your way try to collect as many coins as you can, since those help you with your finish time.

The game was developed as part of curricular activity at Univeristy of Ljubljana, Faculty of Computer and  Information Science, subject Tehnology of video games and Virtual Reality.
